publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-281 Nicola Sturgeon: The Draft Smoking, Health and Social Care (Scotland) Act 2005 (Variation of Age Limit for Sale of Tobacco etc. and Consequential Modifications) Order 2007â€”That the Health and Sport Committee recommends that the draft Smoking, Health and Social Care (Scotland) Act 2005 (Variation of Age Limit for Sale of Tobacco etc. and Consequential Modifications) Order 2007 be approved. Supported by: Shona Robison*
